verbose_text: Experimental studies support the hypothesis that SSBs may increase energy intake and induce weight gain via their reduced satiety response, the promotion of a positive energy balance by liquid calories relative to isoenergetic solid calories, and their dysregulation of energy homeostasis [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR].
evidence: SSBs may increase energy intake and induce weight gain
